participant_1.name: Laura
participant_1.personality: Direct and somewhat confrontational, she values honesty and doesn't shy away from expressing her feelings.
participant_1.background: i've five sons. coffee is my preferred beverage. i also like a glass of wine in the evenings. i drive a mini van.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Caring and a bit laid-back, he has a creative side and enjoys sharing his interests with others.
participant_2.background: i'm a stay at home dad. i spent a decade working in the human services field. my father used to work for home depot. horror movies are my favorites.

content.text: i am a little tired from work
i am a coffee drinker , so i drink coffee while i grow up .
i am a fan of red wine , but i also like to paint .
